name: Max Drift Burnout Racer Car
description:
Step in to the world of arcade gaming and enjoy best of the arcade drifting game, on the sling of your finger touch, drift to the max, mark the torque burnout in the beautiful and huge 3D environment. Which let you play with the real drifting physics on your mobile screen which the maximum effort. Enjoy the one tap games. Download now to enjoy the zigzag levels of the best arcade drifting game for free. Enjoy as long as you, because it’s totally free to play. Challenge your driving skills and see how far you can go in the challenging levels of the drifting game. Get the app now to embark on an endless journey of the fun and leave the skid marks and burn out on the road, drift from the dusk till dawn. GET THE APP NOW!!

Features of the app:
Real drifting physics.
Many interesting and challenging levels.
Beautiful 3D environment.
Amazing and addictive game play.
Fun games like experience for every kind of player.
Amusing and amazing sound effects to make your game play experience.
